# üëã Hi there

I'm Jo√£o Miranda, a passionate software developer and tech enthusiast. I currently work as a Software Developer at SCALA.
With over 4 years of experience in the field, I've had the opportunity to work on various exciting projects and explore different technologies.

## üöÄ About Me
Passionate about creating responsive and high-performance APIs in the most diverse segments, I love developing new things that will impact people in a positive way, I develop back-end, combining modern frameworks with best practice design patterns. With my years of experience always dedicating myself to improving, I have developed the most diverse systems while maintaining the highest standard of performance.

  

In my professional journey, I have worked with old and new projects, monoliths and microservices, with technologies that are already quite outdated at times, so I say that I have a bit of a knack for Java projects, and their challenges, as well as any project I take on.

  

Outside of the professional environment, I love anime and electronic games, as well as programming some fun things that combine these worlds that are so much a part of me.
